name: Wrathful Mantle
target: creature touched or all creatures within 5 ft.; see text
text: A shimmering mantle of light shrouds the subject, casting light like a torch. The subject of the spell gains a +1 resistance bonus on all saving throws per four caster levels (maximum +5 at 20th level). The subject can end the wrathful mantle at any time as a swift action to deal 2d8 points of force damage to all creatures within 5 feet.
components_zh: 语言, 姿势, 法器
range_zh: 接触 或 5尺; 见文本
target_zh: 接触到的生物或5尺范围内的所有生物; 见下文
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效 (无害)
text_zh:
一件闪烁着的光之斗篷笼罩着目标，发出等同于火炬的光亮。

法术目标获得+1抗力加值在所有的豁免检定上 (每4施法者等级+1，最高20级+5)。

目标可以随时以一个迅捷动作结束狂怒斗篷效果并且对附近5尺内的所有生物造成2d8点力场伤害。
